title: Bug 104630 - Column icons not visible when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not show up in the user interface.
EB: The column icons should be visible when connecting to a Derby database in the user interface.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Connect to a Derby database. 
3. Navigate to the table view. 
4. Observe that the column icons are not visible.
